name: Lost in Shadows
description:
Lost in Shadows

Lost in shadows is a puzzle platformer where you have a single light to find your way out . The game has several obstacles which will prevent you from playing easily.

Submitted to IDFGE Game Jam .

The theme was "It's not as big as it seems". This game follows the theme as you find your way you can't stand on every platforms . Thus , the map is not as big as it seems.

Everything in this game was made from scratch by me.
If you think that this game is good do give a donation so that I will me motivated to make more levels and mechanics for this game.
